concept.title: Notifications for player status, activity, errors, and logging
concept.shortdesc: PTNotification objects provide information about changes in player status, warnings, and errors. Errors that stop the playback of the video also cause a change in the status of the player.

conbody.p: Your application can retrieve the notification and status information. You can also create a logging system for diagnostics and validation by using the notification information.

note.p: also uses notification to refer to NSNotifications (PTMediaPlayer notifications) event notifications, dispatched to provide information about player activity.

conbody.p: also issues PTMediaPlayerNewNotificationItemEntryNotification when it issues PTNotification.
You implement event listeners to capture and respond to events. Many events provide PTNotification status notifications.
